2019 Merit Medical Sustainability Report
©2019 Merit MedicalMerit Medical’s Maastricht Distribution Center—a site that services our customers in Europe, the Middle East, and 
Africa (EMEA)—developed a system of reusing a portion of incoming corrugated shipping boxes. Whenever possible, 
these boxes are used to ship consolidated boxes of products to our customers without compromising our high 
standards of customer care and quality, demonstrating that even small efforts can make a difference!
How can Merit Medical make a 
difference? Develop a system of reusing 
a portion of incoming corrugated 
shipping boxes.
